GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v4.14.241
GSD.description:
igb: Fix use-after-free error during reset

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.241 by commit d7367f781e5a9ca5df9082b15b272b55e76931f8, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 7cc6fd4c60f267e17b0baef1580d7a6258c0a6f0. For more details please see the references link.
